name: Hidden Objects - New York Rain Storm - The Pharaohs Treasure Hunt - Spa Massage Meditation Center - California
name_original: Hidden Objects - New York Rain Storm - The Pharaohs Treasure Hunt - Spa Massage Meditation Center - California
description:
Play Free Games on:
www.boogygames.com

This wonderful hidden object game gives you the unique opportunity to find amazing hidden items with beautiful scenes with animation.

4 in 1 Pack:
- New York Rain Storm
- The Pharaohs Treasure Hunt
- Spa Massage Meditation Center
- California

Features
- Beautiful high-quality images
- Animation
- Addictive Hidden Object gameplay
- Catchy sound effects and music!
- Differences randomized on each play
- 3 modes of hints if you get stuck
- Try to score the Highest score!
- No ADS!
